Class Bird

java.lang.Object
  Ahmed.Bird
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener
public class Bird
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener

This is a game that is very similar to "Flappy Bird".I personally liked the game so I decided to recreate it.

Version:
December 3rd, 2015
Author:
Faduma Ahmed

Method Detail

addColumn

public void addColumn(boolean start)
This method makes two columns and randomly decides the height between them. It will initially make the four columns when the user starts the game but will add new columns of different height after

Parameters:
start - , checks if the user just started the game

paintColumn

public void paintColumn(java.awt.Graphics g,

This Method pints the columns on the screen so they are visible to the user

Parameters:
g - , the graphics element
column - , the rectangle columns to appear on the screen
